basics.name: Xueshan Wang

basics.summary: Junior Full Stack Developer with a passion for building web applications. Currently seeking opportunities to further develop my skills in a professional setting.

work.name: Verderia NGO
work.summary: Managing and maintaining the organization's WordPress website while implementing performance optimizations through CloudFlare and ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.
highlights: Implemented CloudFlare for improved website performance and security
Managed WordPress site maintenance and content updates
Successfully configured and maintained DNS settings

Managed domain registration and DNS configuration through CloudFlare
Provided technical support and WordPress solutions for day-to-day operations
Implemented website updates and security patches
Collaborated with team members to ensure website content alignment with goals
achievements: Enhanced website security and performance through CloudFlare integration

work.name: LotusHabits
work.summary: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop responsive web applications using React and Redux, with a focus on enhancing user experience through improved content rendering and Firebase integration.
highlights: Implemented advanced Markdown rendering system to improve content readability
Built robust user authentication system using Firebase
Managed complex application state with Redux
responsibilities: Developed and maintained React-based web applications with Redux state management
Implemented user authentication and data persistence using Firebase
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement responsive web applications
Enhanced content display by implementing advanced Markdown rendering capabilities
achievements: Improved user experience by developing an enhanced Markdown rendering system
Successfully implemented and maintained secure user authentication flow
Established efficient state management patterns using Redux

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.
highlights: Awarded 'Volunteer of the Month'

projects.name: Shopping-Nest
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built to explore and document the complete development process, serving as both a practical implementation and educational content.
highlights: Building frontend with React and TailwindCSS, backend with NestJS and MySQL
Implementing user authentication, product management, and shopping cart functionality
Creating RESTful APIs and establishing secure database connections
Documenting development process through technical blog posts

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio website built to showcase projects and skills with modern web technologies.
highlights: Developing with Astro framework and TailwindCSS for optimal performance
Implementing responsive design and dark mode support
Creating interactive project showcases and skills section

projects.name: Hotaru.TS
projects.description: A Discord-inspired full-stack chat application built for learning purposes.
highlights: Built frontend with React and backend with NestJS
Implemented real-time chat using Socket.io and data storage with MongoDB
Integrated file storage system using MinIO
Developed user authentication and authorization system

projects.name: Kaspersky To 1Password
projects.description: A simple online tool for converting TXT files exported from Kaspersky Password Manager into CSV format that can be imported into 1Password and other password managers.
highlights: Implemented client-side processing ensuring all data remains local for maximum security
Built with React and Tailwind CSS for a responsive, user-friendly interface
Added support for Unicode characters including Chinese text
Created UTF-8 encoding for CSV outputs compatible with multiple password managers

projects.name: BetterBaruch
projects.description: A Chrome/Edge extension that enhances the Baruch College website experience for students.
highlights: Developed browser extension using JavaScript
Built serverless backend with Express.js deployed on AWS Lambda
Published and maintaining extension on Chrome Web Store
Improving student website usability through various features

projects.name: Personal Blog

Writing technical articles and tutorials
Customizing theme and functionality
Managing content deployment and maintenance

projects.name: Hexo-Theme-Ares
